Porrith Suong

I graduated from the City College of New York with a degree in Computer Science and I currently work at Scholastic as a Software Engineer. On my spare time, I am a game developer and a tinkerer, so you'll find my public works on Github.

Additionally, I founded my own company initialPrefabs, where we create custom game development tools for other game development companies. We work closely with other companies in order to achieve their products quicker.

Porrith Suong  •  2017
